Articles.Content:
I'm downloading orbiter, been a while since I had it because last time I got fed up and rage quit. So I have just a few questions.

1) I know there are mods so can I use the Saturn V and launch part of Skylab up into orbit (example)

2) Shuttle carrying a payload, can it be docked to the space station and then the shuttle return to Eart.

3) What planets can I travel too.

4)Is it possiable to build my own modular space station?

1: Yes, I belive there is a mod- might be outdated. However, for the complete apollo missions, download AMSO.

2: Sure, assuming you load up a scenerio with it in it.

3: Any planet in the solar system!

4: Nope, unless you have mods.
